price: 46. Il parlera aux hommes depuis le berceau et à l’âge mûr ; et il sera du nombre des vertueux.
arabic: وَيُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ وَكَهۡلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wamina al-ṣāliḥīna
